fact1054.value: Nordic Nanovector is committed to develop and deliver innovative therapies to patients to address major unmet medical needs. The company aspires to become a leader in the development of CD37-targeted therapies for haematological cancers and immune diseases. Nordic Nanovector’s lead clinical-stage candidate is Betalutin®, a novel CD37-targeting radioimmunotherapy designed to advance the treatment of non-Hodgkin lymphoma (NHL). NHL is an indication with
